title: Plate, "All Power to the Soviets 1917-1967", 1967
markings: Marks: On underside: Dulevo mark (falcon) stamped in green overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular; against a red banner-like background the inscription (in Russian)"All Power to the Soviets" and underneath in gilding "1917-1967"

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "All Power to the Soviets 1917-1967", 1967.
1967. porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-47.
